items.title: Sick Leave
items.description: Employees are entitled to 12 days of paid sick leave annually.

items.title: Casual Leave
items.description: 8 days of casual leave are allowed per year, not to be carried forward.

items.title: Annual Leave
items.description: 18 days of earned leave per year; prior approval is required.

items.title: Emergency Leave
items.description: Can be availed for sudden personal situations with manager approval.

items.title: Birthday Leave
items.description: 1 day special leave granted on birthday month.

items.title: Remote Days
items.description: Employees may work remotely up to 5 days/month with manager approval.

items.title: Extended Remote
items.description: Extended remote work allowed only after HR clearance.

items.title: Office Hours
items.description: Office hours are 9:00 AM to 6:00 PM IST.

items.title: Late Arrivals
items.description: Late arrivals beyond 3 days/month must be justified or adjusted with leave.

items.title: Swipe Requirement
items.description: Swipe-in/out mandatory for presence logging.

items.title: Maternity Leave
items.description: 26 weeks of paid maternity leave.

items.title: Paternity Leave
items.description: 7 days of paid paternity leave within 30 days of childbirth.

items.title: Expense Claims
items.description: Expense claims must be submitted within 7 days of incurring.

items.title: Internet Reimbursement
items.description: ₹1,000/month for remote employees (submit bill).

items.title: Travel Booking
items.description: All travel must be pre-approved and booked via the official portal.

items.title: Weekdays
items.description: Business casuals from Mon–Thu.

items.title: Fridays
items.description: Smart casuals allowed.

items.title: Restrictions
items.description: No flip-flops, shorts, or revealing attire.

items.title: Notice Period
items.description: 30-day notice period is mandatory.

items.title: Exit Interview
items.description: Exit interview is compulsory.

items.title: Asset Return
items.description: All company assets to be returned before the last working day.

items.title: Responsibility
items.description: Employees are responsible for assigned hardware.

items.title: Loss/Damage
items.description: Must be reported immediately and may incur charges.

items.title: Reporting
items.description: Inappropriate conduct must be reported to posh@company.com.

items.title: Confidentiality
items.description: All grievances are handled confidentially.

items.title: Salary Date
items.description: Salary is credited by the 5th of each month.

items.title: Advance
items.description: Allowed once per quarter upon approval.

faqs.question: How do I apply for sick leave?
faqs.answer: Log in to HRMS and apply under Sick Leave section.

faqs.question: How many annual leaves do I have left?
faqs.answer: Check HRMS > Leave Balance for updated info.

faqs.question: Where can I see the holiday list?
faqs.answer: HRMS > Company > Holidays.

faqs.question: Can I work remotely from another city?
faqs.answer: Yes, with manager and HR approval for more than 5 days.

faqs.question: What is the dress code on Fridays?
faqs.answer: Smart casuals are allowed on Fridays.

faqs.question: How to claim internet reimbursement?
faqs.answer: Upload your bill via HRMS > Claims > Internet.

faqs.question: What is the maternity leave policy?
faqs.answer: 26 weeks of paid maternity leave.

faqs.question: How can I get my pay slip?
faqs.answer: Payslips are emailed monthly and accessible via HRMS.

faqs.question: What to do if I lost my ID card?
faqs.answer: Inform Admin and pay ₹300 replacement fee.

faqs.question: How to book travel for official trips?
faqs.answer: Use Concur with manager-approved itinerary.

faqs.question: How are promotions decided?
faqs.answer: Based on performance, need, and appraisal ratings.

faqs.question: Can I get a certificate for completed training?
faqs.answer: Email L&D with course name and date.

faqs.question: Can I get a salary advance?
faqs.answer: Submit Salary Advance form via HRMS.

faqs.question: How do I report workplace harassment?
faqs.answer: Email posh@company.com or contact HR.

faqs.question: Can I leave early for an exam?
faqs.answer: Submit exam schedule and request special leave.

faqs.question: Is dental included in insurance?
faqs.answer: Only in the Premium Plan.

faqs.question: Can I work half-day on birthday?
faqs.answer: Take 1 full day special birthday leave via HRMS.

faqs.question: Is team lunch reimbursable?
faqs.answer: Yes, up to ₹500/person with prior approval.

faqs.question: How do I handover company assets during resignation?
faqs.answer: Contact IT/Admin before your last working day.

faqs.question: Can I wear jeans in the office?
faqs.answer: Yes, on Fridays or casual days.

faqs.question: What is the process for resignation?
faqs.answer: Submit via HRMS and notify manager.

faqs.question: When will my laptop be replaced?
faqs.answer: After 3 years or when declared non-functional.

faqs.question: Can I access HRMS from mobile?
faqs.answer: Yes, available via web and mobile app.

faqs.question: What is my UAN for PF check?
faqs.answer: Check welcome email or ask HR.

faqs.question: Who to contact for laptop repairs?
faqs.answer: Raise a ticket on the IT Helpdesk.
